alert.note: Alert for Mercer (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued October 04 at 3:45AM EDT until October 04 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Virginia, Tazewell, Smyth, Bland and Wythe Counties. In West Virginia, Mercer County. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This includes Interstate 81 through Smyth and Wythe counties in southwest Virginia as well as Interstate 77 through Wythe and Bland counties in southwest Virginia and Mercer county in southern West Virginia.
info.instruction: Reduce speed, leave extra distance between you and the vehicle in front of you, allow extra time to reach your destination, and use your low beam headlights as you travel early this morning.
